System with 4 or 2 number of Weyl points in the configuration space 
n: 2
x	z

4 Weyl points: 
Add(Mul(Float('0.16820751776522525', precision=53), sin(Symbol('beta_2', Real=True))), Mul(Float('0.41335316904792851', precision=53), sin(Mul(Integer(2), Symbol('beta_2', Real=True)))))	Add(Mul(Integer(-1), Float('0.093821577201935846', precision=53), sin(Symbol('beta_1', Real=True))), Mul(Float('0.27782667012360296', precision=53), sin(Mul(Integer(2), Symbol('beta_1', Real=True)))), Mul(Float('0.45905476650858124', precision=53), cos(Symbol('beta_1', Real=True))), Mul(Integer(-1), Float('0.087793882105079768', precision=53), cos(Mul(Integer(2), Symbol('beta_1', Real=True)))), Mul(Float('0.20900249170289076', precision=53), cos(Symbol('beta_2', Real=True))), Mul(Integer(-1), Float('0.41008769477705709', precision=53), cos(Mul(Integer(2), Symbol('beta_2', Real=True)))))
2 Weyl points:
